rh40ei^GP)6RU_BnXkBU: P%cnKMz;v:,fE]RdflIM
aha... you are finally here, young ninja.
you are here, because i summoned you for a mission
a really important mission
the world is unstable, so you need to make it stable.
now, listen carefully...
we don't have much time.
we are in a war, actually before the war begin.
your mission is to send this letter to shogun, be careful, there is many obstacle that you have to go through.
this letter is the key to win the war
here is the letter
i will not go with you, but i will give you some guards to make you safe, even during this tough time
your power is unstable heart, you'll see what's the meaning of that later.
if you ready, you can leave now. just go...
but, master ...
you can upgrade while pause by pressing 'p' button. coins can be earned if you kill an enemy.
good luck.

l)$h3fPMotPTvcvXtre2: xQ6n$Db1A#J3albM4ceG
mage (oak mage): a mage is a powerful weapon that contain power of magic, whether a black magic.
ninja blade (unstable knife): this is quite a sturdy blade, but this blade is short as a knife. *note: it will also resist
ninja blade (footman blade): this upgrade can make sword swing faster, even slightly increase damage, about 0.25 point. *note: press z to swing
ninja blade (nihontou): increased damage about 0.5, and faster swing. (press z to swing)
ninja blade (paladin's blade): increase damage by 0.25, charge super crazy, almost without rest. (press z to swing)
mage (oak mage): a mage is a powerful weapon that contain power of magic, whether a black magic.
mage (wizard's mage): it will make sky bubble more aggresive, and also cast a whopping 10 point of damage. (press z to cast a spell)

mage (sorcerer mage): this mage is the essence of all possible variation in the battlefield. it will like make more coin drops from enemy, free coin every second, and most awesome, press 'x' to create your clone!
shikoro (rust metal shikoro): a shikoro is a true weapon of ninja. it's more useful if you use it like a blade, but you already has a blade.
shikoro (metalic shikoro): can charge more faster, and deal more damage about 0.5 point. (press z to throw)
shikoro (slick shikoro): a sharp edged point can deal 0.5 more damage.
shikoro (charged shikoro): it will charge super fast.

armor (leather stony armor): this suit is probably not the best suit, but it will do the best for you, it will avoid soft damage, but not critical. *currently unavailable, defeat a samurai to obtain the recipe
armor (leather stony armor): this suit is probably not the best suit, but it will do the best for you, it will avoid soft damage, but not critical.
armor (ninja armor): with some costumization, samurai armor can act as ninja armor. can avoid sword, arrows, but not magic and poison.
armor (fallen armor): with this upgrade, you can now avoid poison, and a bit of magic attack. *note: containing magic that near to black magic
shield (deku shield): deku mean a big stick that's not useful. *currently unavailable, let a shieldman pass to examine his shield
shield (deku shield): deku mean a big stick that's not useful. *note: press space to block
shield (eagle shield): a rare shield. (press space to block)
shield (dragon shield): a normal shield, but heavy, it will be more big, and be the path to spike shield.
shield (dragon spike shield): this is the biggest and sharpest shield in the battlefield. it can also give damage to attackers.
ninja blade (footman blade): this upgrade can make sword swing faster, even slightly increase damage, about 0.25 point. *note: press z to swing
ninja blade (nihontou): increased damage about 0.5, and faster swing. (press z to swing)
ninja blade (paladin's blade): increase damage by 0.25, charge super crazy, almost without rest. (press z to swing)
mage (oak mage): a mage is a powerful weapon that contain power of magic, whether a black magic. *its currently unavailable, you need to defeat a wizard, and claim the recipe
mage (oak mage): a mage is a powerful weapon that contain power of magic, this will also upgrade stacc, the magical armor. *note: press z to cast a spell
mage (wizard's mage): it will make sky bubble more aggresive, and also cast a whopping 10 point of damage. (press z to cast a spell)

mage (sorcerer mage): this mage is the essence of all possible variation in the battlefield. it will like make more coin drops from enemy, free coin every second, and most awesome, press 'x' to create your clone!
shikoro (rust metal shikoro): a shikoro is a true weapon of ninja. it's more useful if you use it like a blade, but you already have a blade. *note: press z to throw
shikoro (metalic shikoro): can charge more faster, and deal more damage about 0.5 point. (press z to throw)
shikoro (slick shikoro): a sharp edge point can deal 0.5 more damage.
shikoro (charged shikoro): it will charge super fast.
recources (meat n' water): nyam! yum! burp! these will boost your strength only when you are starving! these can also heal.
recources (prune fruit): slurp! krack! shup! these juicy fruit will give you strength effect all though not strong then stick of a meat!
recources (bezoar): crack! bezoar is a magical object that can cure you from many poisons. it can protect you from poison damage, but only for temporarily
shield (deku shield): deku means a big stick that's not useful.
shield (eagle shield): a rare shield.
shield (dragon shield): a normal shield, but heavy, it will be bigger, and could be the path to spike shield.
shield (dragon spike shield): this is the biggest and sharpest shield in the battlefield. it can also give damage to attackers.
armor (leather stony armor): this suit is probably not the best suit, but it will do the best for you, it will protect you from minor damage, but not critical.
armor (ninja armor): with some customization, samurai armor can act as ninja armor. can protect you from sword, arrows, but not from magic and poison.
armor (crystal costumized armor): with some solid crystals, armor can start damaging back to attacker!
armor (fallen armor): with this upgrade, you can now avoid poison, and a bit of magic attack.
stacc (oak stacc): a stacc is an invisible mage armor that can absorb low damages.
stacc (wizard's stacc): now the armor can absorb 0.25 of damage.
stacc (sorcerer stacc): now the armor will absorb variants of normal damage, about 0.5 point.
shield unlocked! now you can buy it from store! just press 'p'

rh40ei^GP)6RU_BnXkBU: haha that was an easy task isn't it?
we need to guard him!
ugh... goodbye everyone...
nooo! why! he was only my best friend... he just died like that?!...
ugh... i'll leave it to you... remember... don't let us die for nothing...
